blogSubtitle: My personal view on crowdsourcing, citizen science and web development.
projectsSubtitle: My crowdsourcing, citizen science and open source projects.
aboutTech: The tools you need to build your project
aboutTechInfo: In these 10 years, I've specialized in Python, Javascript (ES6), CSS3, SVG+SMIL, VueJS, NuxtJS, PostgreSQL and Redis. This has allowed me to develop [tools that have more than 600 stars in Github](https://github.com/teleyinex). Institutions like the British Museum, British Library, Cancer Research UK, the Guardian Australia, Greenpeace Spain or European Space Agency (ESA) are just a few examples of the companies that have trusted in my work.
